JSON_file_access.issue: File path with line breaks causing parse errors
JSON_file_access.fix: Use single-line command without line breaks

IMPORTANT_LEARNINGS.md.title: PowerShell Here-String and Console Color Syntax Requirements
key_points: Here-string closing delimiter must be at line start with no indentation
Valid ConsoleColors do not include 'Purple' - use 'Magenta' instead
Hashtable Get_Item() only accepts 1 parameter - use ContainsKey() for checks

Fix Get_Item method calls in FinalDocumentationKnowledgeTransfer.ps1
Verify JSON file naming and access issues
Update IMPORTANT_LEARNINGS.md with PowerShell syntax lessons
